sentences.sContent: Due to the complexity of the compliance domain, an organization is unlikely to undergo successful audits if the required evidence is not readily available or cannot be warranted to be genuine.
sentences.sContent_eng: Due to the complexity of the compliance domain, an organization is unlikely to undergo successful audits if the required evidence is not readily available or cannot be warranted to be genuine.
sentences.sCn: 根据法规遵循域的复杂性，如果不能容易地获取需求证据或是不能保证其真实性，一家企业是不可能成功通过审核的。

words.tran: 保证；担保；授权；（正当）理由
根据；证明；正当理由；委任状
